Uses of HttpException in inspiracio.servlet.http
 

Subclasses of HttpException in inspiracio.servlet.http
 class BadRequestException
          A method called within an http request signals that the response to the request should be 400 Bad request.
 class ForbiddenException
          A method called within an http request signals that the response to the request should be 403 Forbidden.
 class InternalServerErrorException
          A method called within an http request signals that the response should be 500 Internal Server Error.
 class MethodNotAllowedException
          Status code (405) indicating that the method specified in the Request-Line is not allowed for the resource identified by the Request-URI.
 class NotAuthorizedException
          A method called within an http request signals that the response should be 401 Not Authorized.
 class NotFoundException
          A method called within an http request signals that the response to the request should be 404 Not found.
 class PreconditionFailedException
          A method called within an http request signals that the response should be 412 Precondition Failed.
